_header: Mercy is hendest where sin is most
_description: On the Mercy of God — three couplets

BLHar2316.First Lines: Mercy is hendest whore sinne is mestMercy is lattere ȝef sinne is lest…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …Mercy sauet ȝat lawe wolde spilleMercy asket but godes wille
